_meta.description: Chatterbox TTS - High-quality expressive TTS with emotion tags and voice cloning
_meta.use_case: Generate expressive speech with paralinguistic sounds (laughs, sighs, etc.)

agent_notes.TEXT: Text to synthesize. Supports emotion tags: [laugh], [sigh], [gasp], [chuckle], [cough], [sniff], [groan], [shush], [clear throat]
agent_notes.REFERENCE_AUDIO: Optional: Voice reference for cloning (3-10 seconds)
agent_notes.EXAGGERATION: Emotion intensity (0.0-1.0). Higher = more expressive. 0.5 is natural.
agent_notes.CFG_WEIGHT: Classifier-free guidance weight (0.0-1.0). Higher = closer to reference.
emotion_examples: I can't believe it worked! [laugh] This is amazing!
[sigh] I suppose you're right about that.
[clear throat] Let me begin the presentation.
agent_notes.best_for: English language, expressive content, podcasts, character voices

2._comment: Generate expressive speech with optional voice cloning
